15312222212112121.content:
As soon as the doors opened, memories flooded my head. I was the Rogers' adopted child, the same age as their biological child, Clem, they were alien shapeshifters, Rhea had psychic powers. A lot of this, I already knew, so it didn't overwhelm me as much. Cait opened the next door. More memories flooded my head, causing me to collapse to the ground, clutching my head. Cait pulled me through the door and closed it. My memories of my life as Clem's adopted sibling vanished, replaced by memories of being part of another family.

"What is real?" I asked "What is the real me?"

"Come on," said Cait, encouragingly "Just a few more, now, I'm going to open the next door, are you ready?"

I nodded, bracing myself.

Cait opened the door, and I, felt the pain of holding three sets of memories in my head. I was ready for it this time, I staggered through the door as Cait locked it. I now had memories of being part of yet another family. I wasn't even paying attention to the details anymore, I just wanted it all to end. Cait led me through a few more doors. The pain got easier to bear as we descended through the families. Eventually, we arrived at the bottom, the very last door.

My name is Alex Winters, older brother to Tommy and Aura Winters. As the firstborn of the family, I've always tried to protect my siblings, but when the Agency came, I was powerless to stop them from taking both my siblings and me....

We had just celebrated Tommy's twelfth birthday before our nightmare began, Tommy, Aura and I had come to Europe on vacation. Only, our bungalow was not yet ready so we had to find a hotel room to stay for the night. We had walked into a hotel, just inside the outskirts of Rome and approached the desk where dad politely cleared his throat. He was an average sized man, from what I remember, but he was very strong, always wearing a business suit....

“May I help you?” asked the clerk, politely.

“Yes, we are vacationing here in your beautiful nation." smiling, dad said. "Unfortunately, our bungalow is not ready yet. We were hoping you had a room available for the four of us tonight.”

The desk clerk looked down at some papers then turned back to dad, smiling. “You’re in luck, sir.” he said. “A gentleman, Mr. Kline, had reserved a two bedroom suite a few weeks ago but canceled at the last minute. He left instructions to give the room to someone who could use it. It‘s paid up until the end of next week”

Dad smiled. “Now, that’s generosity.” he said.

The clerk nodded. “He’s known for that.” he waved to someone behind them. “If you will be kind enough to sign in on the registry, I will have the bellhop carry your bags up.”

Dad signed his name in the book but I insisted that I could carry the bags and followed my family to the elevator, which took up up to the tenth floor.

“This is your room, sir." jokingly acting like a bellhop, I said.

“Thank you, kind sir.” chuckling, dad replied. “Just leave the bags here, my kids and I can carry them in.”

“Yes, sir.” giggling, I said. “Thank you.”

With that, I placed the bags down so to carry them in one at a time dad unlocked the door and walked in with mom following close behind. Standing with Tommy and Aura in the hall, we had just gathered the smaller bags and were about to enter the room. Just as we reached the door, a powerful explosion rocked the room, sending all three of us to the floor. I looked up as Aura screamed to find, to my horror, that the room mom and dad had just walked into was completely engulfed in flames.

“Daddy!”

The next few days afterward were a blur to me as Tommy, Aura, and I were taken away to a strange, frightening place were we were separated and I was given a number of injections, making my mind feel clouded and confused.

“You will do exactly as you are told.” one man had said. “If you don’t, we will beat your brother and sister until they stop moving. Is that clear, Alex?”

"You won't get away with this!" angry, I snapped. "I will find a way out of here and send the law right down your throats!"

The man laughed. "I'd love to see you try." leaning in close, he said.

I fumed in anger then... I passed out. I woke up what seemed like seconds later standing in an alley in a town I did not recognize. After a moment, I also realized that I could not remember much at all, just my name, Alex....

It had been a year since then and I was just now remembering my brother and sister, still trapped with those monsters. Tears flowed down my face. Mom and dad were dead; my brother and sister were counting on me to get them help and I failed because I forgot everything. Only, if I remembered all of this from the bottom of all my repressed memories, maybe where they are being held is locked somewhere in my memory as well. It became important to me to find out.

"Cait, can you freeze memories, like videos?" I asked.

"I could try," said Cait "What do you want me to freeze?"

"I'll tell you when," I said, then started playing the dream/memory. When I instructed Cait to freeze it, the memory froze. I walked into the frozen memory, along with Cait. In my dream, and in my memory, I had not gotten a very good look at the room. Aside from the chair, where the younger version of me was tied up, I saw a table with various papers on it. I walked over to it, and turned the papers over, looking for anything that might tell me where the Agency had taken me.

"Alex, come over here a minute," I joined her over next to the memory me in the chair.
"There seems to be another set of repressed memories here, hang on a second..." Cait touched memory me's head. Memory me morphed, becoming the female me I had vague recollections of being while in other families.
"I'm sorry, Alex," said Cait "But this is another level of repressed memories, you weren't born as a boy, you were born a girl, you just don't remember it."
"No," I said "No, that can't be true, I was always a guy, even in my dreams, I was a guy."
"And it's a really clever defence mechanism," said Cait "Think about it, you vanished right out of Agency HQ, if they were still looking for you, they would be looking for a young girl, not a young boy, your powers somehow caught on to your desire to hide, so, it wiped your memory, and made you think you were always a boy, I'm sorry Alex, but you are biologically a girl."
"No," I said, refusing to believe what I was hearing "That can't be."
"Look, I'll explain later, once I've talked to Mr and Mrs Rogers, right now, you wanted to check something?"

I pulled my mind back to the task at hand. I, again, went over to the papers.
"Wait," I said "Isn't this a UK postcode?"
Cait came over, and looked at the letters and numbers on the letter.
"Yes," she said "Edinburgh by the looks of it, the Agency must have a base there."

Those I could live with, but the last new feature of mine definitely said freak. Gills...that's right, gills. I could feel them taking in air as they opened and closed.

"Travis what happened?!" shouted a voice.

<i>Oh man it's my mom! If she sees this she'll freak! But I need an excuse for the scream...uh.....</i>

I didn't reply in time. The door swung open and my mom had her usual worried expression on her face. But this expression changed to complete shock. But it wasn't a first time shock, it was like the time I found my favorite toy when I was a kid hidden in my parents closet. She was hiding something from me, I could tell from her face. And it had to do with this. Tears began to fall from her eyes and she quickly left. I wanted to go after her, but I could tell she needed to do something alone. I just hope she would be alright.

=======================

Mrs. Greenway walked down the stairs in tears. The one thing she  managed to hide from her son, and he finally found it. She mentally kicked herself from her mistake. She walked to the phone and dialed in a number. The tone rang twice before someone finally answered.

"Hello?" asked a voice.

"Hi...dear..." she replied in tears.

"Jennifer....? What's wrong?! What happened...?!"

"It's...it's Travis..."

"What happened to Travis?!" A silence passed, Jennifer unable to say anything. "Oh...he found out..."

"Harold...I don't know what to do..."

"Settle down dear....just make sure Travis doesn't go anywhere. I'll be home as soon as I can."

With that Jennifer hung up and waited patiently for her husband.

======================

After the experience with mom I took a long shower. But despite the hot water I couldn't get the fact my mom was hiding something. And, if it related, was she hiding this? After my shower, I dressed in comfortable shorts a a T-shirt. I chose a T-shirt because I was still curios about my new feature. Gills...that explains why my windpipe was splitting.

That leads to another thing, what were those other two glands? Before I could continue thinking, a knock on my door shook me out. "Honey...it's mom" she said. I could still hear her sadness. "Could...could you come downstairs...your father and I want to talk to you."

I waited a few seconds before finally leaving my room. From the upstairs I could hear small sobs from my mom. I walked down the stairs, seeing my mom with her hands against her face and crying. My dad was beside her, gently hugging her. Once I hit the last step, both of my parents were aware.

"Hello son" said my father.

I took a seat in the chair across from the couch my parents were in. "What's going on?" I asked calmly.

"It's that...well..."

My mom suddenly burst into tears. "We've been lying to you!"

I sensed it but I never knew it was true. "Yes son...we have been lying to you. It's that....we are technically are not your parents..."

I wasn't expecting that. "...Then...who are you...? More importantly...who...or what am I...?"

"Well, your mother and I are scientists...as for you...your name is Travis...but you are...a lab experiment..."
1541.title: I'M A WHAT?!?!

15411.content:
I couldn't take that. Of all the things he could have said, that was the worst. I don't know why but it just lit my temper like a firework.

"So what your saying is I'm not your sob, but a TEST TUBE BABY?!?!" I shouted.

Both of my parents were surprised to hear my voice raise. "Well son...technically your right...but..."

"But WHAT father?! OH! Right! You're not even my father! So why am I even listening to you?!"

"Travis...please..." my mother said, "Calm down..."

"Calm down? CALM DOWN?! THERE IS NO WAY IM GOING TO CALM DOWN!!!!" I felt this weird sensation inside me, but I ignored it. My yelling sounded more like a growl, but I didn't care. "All my life I was happy to be in a family with a mother and father. Fourteen years I felt like that, fourteen years. And now, now I'm told I wasn't even their son?! What?! Was it cheaper or easier to create me with chemicals?!"

The man that claimed to be my father stood up and looked at me in the eye. "Now listen here. You may have been created from a lab, but you are our son."

"Oh no, you're just pulling that just so I can calm down. But NO! I'm not going to listen to you anymore!"

My "mother" stood up, but not from anger. "Travis...your anger...it could..."

"What?! What could my anger possibly do?! Cause you two to decide to throw me away like done old science fair project?! No! You're not my mother! You're not my father! AND I AM NOT YOU'RE.......!"

My stomach suddenly felt like it was on fire. The pain was too great for me to handle, I fell to the floor. It felt like my spine was twisting inside my body. Parts of it began to push out on my back, and there were even some starting below my arms. Suddenly the pain spiked, causing me to scream. It felt like someone was trying to push a large metal pole through my body. I thought I heard a rip but couldn't exactly tell. The pain died down, the heat and cramps fading. I was panting hard, still trying to grip what just happened. I felt someone near me, don't know how, but someone was. I managed to glance up, seeing my "mother." She seemed to be in tears by just looking at me.

"Travis..." she slowly said. "Please son...don't be mad..."

I tried to get up but the pain was top great. But, to my surprise, my "parents" came to help me up. The didn't get under my arms, like there was something else there. There was, I could feel it. I also felt something on my back, three things actually. Once I was able to stand up, my "parents" backed away.

I changed again, but this time more physically. I now had an extra set of arms, each finger ended with a small claw. I turned my head, seeing two new growths. They were wings, but they weren't the same. One was a large bat wing, with black leathery skin between the bones. The other was a bird wing, covered in dark blue feathers. I looked at all my arms; a few had a couple brown scales speckled across them. I was a freak....a hideous freak. I didn't even want to know what my face now looked like. But, in that dead of silence, I knew someone was still here. I raised my head, seeing my "parents."
15411.title: Anger amplifies

choices: Go online to see of anyone is on
154111.content:
I couldn't believe what I saw. I was more of a freak then ever before. I could feel rage pass over me once again. I nearly pounced on my "mother" but something hit my neck. I grabbed the item, it was a dart. I turned to the side to glare at "father" as a growl escaped my lips. I was about to lunge at him, but all my energy seemed to drain right out of me. The last thing I saw was my "mother" crying. After that everything went dark.

============

My head felt like it got hit with a sledge hammer. I managed to open my eyes and saw the ever so familiar ceiling to my bedroom. I sat up slowly, my entire body throbbing in pain. "Well I guess that's what happens when your body changes." I thought.

I examined myself to find that I was normal again. Two arms, no wings, no claws, nothing. I would have jumped for joy if wasn't in so much pain. There was a knock on my door, but no one came in. "Come in." I said.

My 'mother' stepped into the room. What was left of my cheery mood vanished as a low growl escaped my lips. I guess I still had some anger left in me. "What do you want?" I said coldly.

My voice seemed to make her tear up. Even if she wasn't my mother, I felt a little guilty. "I...I wanted to see if you were alright son..."

"Oh, so now I am your son?"

"You always were..."

I stopped my attitude and just decided to listen. She walked over and sat beside me.

"Travis, you were always our son. You just were not born how most kids were." she explained. "You see, I was once a member of the Agency. It was an underground organization in Europe that used kids with special and unique powers to do their dirty work. I had the gift of 'imaginative superior' intellect."

"Imaginative superior intellect?" I asked, confused.

Mom nodded. "I had the power to literally convert imagination into reality, making me a target when I was but a child." she said, tearing up more. "I was ten when I was abducted by the Agency. I was trapped and terrified but they taught many things and I was able to push my boundaries. The Agency wanted me to be a permanent worker, but I always dreamed of escape." she sighed. "I was on my eighteenth birthday when that opportunity finally arose. It was the day I met and ran off with the Problem Child Gang..."

"You were in the Problem Child Gang?!" That was the last thing she could have said to catch my attention. I mean, I was listening, but I had no idea she would say THAT! "Which one were you?!"

"I was named Crystal but I was not a member of the group, not officially..." said mom. she placed a light hand onto my shoulder. "I did not come up here to talk about me, but rather to explain what you are. You are our son, just not in the way you expect. I am infertile, which means I can't give birth, a switch off for the power I have. Your father and I were devastated, but being scientists we found a solution. By getting one sperm cell from your father and a very rare egg cell capable of fertilization from me, it began to form you. Unfortunately an accident occurred."

"This is probably why I have these different parts."

"Yes. You see, normal test tube babies are fertilized in the lab then placed into the mother after a few days to allow nature to take its course." explained mom, her voice quivering. "You were no different but... consider my power."

"What happened?" curious, I pressed.

"While I was a few days pregnant with you, an assistant we thought we could trust, attacked me. It turns out he was from the Agency." said mom, tears falling. "Several test tubes from another project were knocked off and shattered onto the floor during the struggle." she sighed, crying. "Your father came in and fought the man off but I was thrown onto the shattered glass of the test tubes, sending some of their contents into my bloodstream."

"DNA samples of every animal on Earth." I whispered, putting two and two together. "Is that it?"

"From every animal group but yes." said mom, crying freely. "Things went from bad to worse after that. Of course, we were very scared to see how you would turn out, but we decided to let you go to see what would happen. Just call it the scientist in us. Although we decided to leave you alone, another scientist thought otherwise."

"How so?" I asked, hanging on every word.

"A love rival named Dr. Emily Long was jealous of me being with your father. When she heard I was pregnant with you, she got...creative."

"What do you mean 'creative'?"

"She tried to force a miscarry by injecting me with a DNA bonding agent she had been working on, telling me it was a vitamin shot." said mom, anger in her voice. "By the time we realized what she had done, you had the combined DNA of nearly every animal group on Earth due to the DNA samples already in my bloodstream."

I was mad...but strangely happy. I mean, I always wanted to do some stuff that animals could do, and now I can. But something never added up. "Of I had all of that DNA, why do I remember being a human for years?"

"Remember that shot you got every six months? We had a serum made that hid all of your animal features. We saw no change in you this year so we stopped for a bit. Sometimes when we skip it some features appear."

"So that explains the two organs they found."

"Extra organs...?"

Oh crap, I forgot that she never knew. I never was able to keep a secret. My mom was staring at me now. "Travis...what extra organs are you talking about?"

"The checkup yesterday showed I had two new unknown organs. I never told you because you worry too much."

She seemed like she was going to protest but didn't. My mom told me to stay in the room and then gave me a goodbye kiss. Once she left I walked to my bathroom mirror. I took a look to see what I still had. My eyes seemed slightly thin, and I still had pointed teeth. I saw no gills, which I was slightly sad about. I really wanted to try breathing underwater. But, I guess I'll have to train or something. I mean, there's no way I have all of the powers now. I was alone for a few hours, so I needed to do something.
154111.title: Explanations

1541111.content:
I tried to make myself change into various animals for several hours, without any success. It frustrated me to no end as a mere tantrum leashed a horror show of several animals. It made me shudder to think that could be my true form but I kept trying until I fell onto my bed in exhaustion. "Why can't I change?" I asked myself, as I slowly drifted off. "What am I doing wrong?"

I woke up the next morning to find my mattress, my entire bed torn to shreds! I let out a yell and jumped up, startled, only to hit the ceiling seven feet above my bed. Letting out another yelp, I came crashing down in a heap, stunned and surprised as I rubbed my throbbing head. "Ow! What happened!?"

Looking around, I saw that my bed was not the only thing that had been torn up. The entire room was trashed and I instinctively ran out of my room to check on mom and dad. "Were we attacked!?" I thought, frightened. "Did I somehow fight of whoever it was in my sleep!?"

Reaching mom and dad's room, I found them missing and ran down to the kitchen to find them to be unharmed but visibly shaken. They turned to me as I entered the room and smiled sadly. "You turned out better than we could have ever imagined, Travis." she said, teary eyed. "Only I fear you will have a difficult time adjusting."

I shook my head, frightened and disturbed then ran from the house in tears, trying to make sense of it all. "I don't even know what I am anymore!" you cried, running down a dirt road. "What's happening to me!?"

It was nearly a half hour before I finally stopped, completely out of breath, and looked around. I was in the county wilderness preserve... 35 miles from home! "How on Earth did I get here so fast?" I wondered.

Then, I noticed a small pond and, for some odd reason, I felt a great urge to drink form it. Deciding there would be no serious harm, a walked up to the pool. That was when I discovered that I had transformed. Only I had not exactly become an animal, I was now an Anthropomorphic version of a cheetah! My face was cat like with slit eyes, ears on the top of my head, and a small black nose. As examined myself further, I found that I looked very much like a cross between a human and a cheetah in my clothes, I even had a tail! Only I had my same build and six foot height.

"So this is my power." I whispered. "I'm an Anthro morph."
1541111.title: Just under the surface.

choices: Arrive back, parents are worried, especially Crystal
15411112.content:
I stared at my reflection in the pond. Using my hands, I felt my face to make sure I wasn't dreaming. I pinched my cheek, feeling pain and my skin reacting to it. I was indeed an anthro cheetah. I could feel and control my new tail. If it wasn't for the torn bedsheets and my parents' reactions, this would be so cool.

"I wonder what else I can change into" I said aloud.

Behind me I heard laughter. I panicked and dove into thick bushes. I looked ahead, seeing a pair of kids and what appeared to be their parents. Looks like I chose the wrong time to stay...

Not many people went on the trails in the wilderness reserve due to the few animal attacks that happen. But there are that handful that enjoy walks completely surrounded by nature. I loved taking walks here, now I know why. The family began to pass but the little girl stopped. "Mommy what's that yellow thing?"

Oh crap! I forgot that I was still a cheetah! I need to change and fast! Whatever I did to change before better work now!

I concentrated on my form. I didn't care what I became, I just wanted something dark colored. I felt something happen in my body, but I heard the mother's footsteps approach the child, "What yellow thing sweetheart?"

I mentally sighed and cheered for my success. I opened my eyes to see the pair leave. I waited about five minutes before deciding to move out. But, I felt awkward now. I tried to move my legs, but I did not feel any legs. I reached my hand out to grab whatever was replacing it. I discovered two things; one was that I was now covered in scales, and two was that I had a large tail. My guess, I was a snake anthro, or under technical terms, a naga.

I began to walk...er...slither out of the bushes. I moved back to the pond to see my new look. My face was that identical to a snake's; yellow slit eyes, a brown scaly muzzle, small dents in the sides of my head(ears). My height seemed different but that was probably a result from my tail. My build seemed bigger than normal. I smiled my scaly smile but then two skin flaps shot out from my head. The insides held a very sinister but colorful design. I was a anthro cobra, not just a snake.

This was possibly the coolest thing ever. I could tap into the multiple DNA inside my body and shapeshift into the animal while still keeping my human-like posture. If only I could show this to my friend Mech. Megan Connors or "Mech" as she is all known as was one of my best friends. She was incredibly good with technology and relatively athletic. But she never bothered to join a sports team. I also kind of had a crush on her. Okay, I still do. It's just that I can trust her with anything, why not this?

I was about to change back into either my human or cheetah form, but something stopped me. I know I could probably do more, but I guess I can only do these right now. But what stopped me was that I had no pants on. I guess my snake tail caused it to rip. There was no way I was going back half naked. I just needed to be careful when going back to the house. My parents are probably worried.
15411112.title: Close Call

choices: Test powers even further, sudden form change
154111121.content:
Getting back to my house was pretty hard. It wasn't the fact that I was 35 miles away, it was because not everyone's yard had easy coverage. Luckily for me, a storm began to blow through. The roads were now dark and no one was outside. But the bad news was that it was raining. I couldn't go into the front door, I would track mud. I slithered to the back door and knocked on it. To my surprise, the door cracked when I just knocked. Any harder and I would have punched a hole straight through. The door opened, revealing my mom. Tears were in her eyes, but now they were streaming down her face now. Before I knew it, I was embraced into a super tight mother hug.

"Oh Travis, thank god your alright!" she said. "When you ran off and didn't come back I thought...I thought..."

I hugged her back, trying not to get her too wet. "I'm sorry mom...I was just scared. But I have some control of my powers now. I don't blame you or dad what happened to me, I'm glad it happened. And I promise that I will never abuse what gift I have."

My mom tried to stop crying but her tears kept flowing out. My father came and needed to separate us. "Oh, and mom, can you bring me some pants? I don't want to track mud in the house."

"Sure honey, and thank you for thinking like that."

As my mother left, my father approached me. "So I was told that you knew about your mother and my past" he said. "We still have a few connections with the other members. They are our friends as well. Maybe we could spread the word, let them keep an eye on you too."

"Thanks dad...and thank you mom."

Mom just came with my pants. Instead of going human, I decided to change into my cheetah form. After which I quickly put the pants on and walked inside.

"Travis, why are you in that form?" asked my mom.

"If I'm going to control it, I'm going to have to stay in certain forms. Besides, I...kinda like being an anthro morph..."

"Well just know that whatever form you take we will always love you." I was hugged by my mother and my father. "But no bees" said my father.

"Harold!"

I laughed and went back upstairs to my room.
154111121.title: Relief

choices: "Sorry, no one is allowed to see her now."
1541111212.content:
After taking a proper shower still in my cheetah form, I simply laid in bed for a couple of minutes. Being an anthro morph was awesome, but I had to be human from time to time. The last thing I want to do is get stuck as an anthro and make the morning news worldwide. But, I needed to at least be able to perform daily stuff in these forms. I glanced over at my desk and saw my laptop.

Megan should probably be online, she loves technology. I got up and sat down in my swivel chair. I booted the power on my laptop and waited for it to load.

"I wonder how I should tell her" I said aloud. "She can keep a secret, but I wonder how she would react. Probably one of those "Prove it by coming over!" moments."

The laptop finished loading and I went onto Facebook. I clicked on Megan Connors's page but something troubling popped up. It was her latest message:

AAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

What... What happened to me!?! My teeth are... are...

What's going on!?! Mom, I'm scared!

For some weird reason my laptop shut off after I read that. Something was wrong, and Megan was in trouble. I ran downstairs without even knowing how much speed I used. I grabbed the house phone, dialed Megan's house number, and waited for an answer. The ringing sounded funny, but someone picked up.

"Hello?" said a voice. It wasn't Megan, but it was her mother.

"Mrs. Connors, it's Travis. Is Megan alright?" I asked.

"Sorry Travis, but we needed to send Megan to a hospital. Something went...wait, how did..."

The phone went dead before she could say another word. I slammed the phone down and began to run again but both my mother and father were at the door.

"What's wrong dear?" asked my mom.

"I need to get to the hospital, Megan is there!"

"You mean that girl you like?" asked my father.

"Yes but I have no time to explain! I need to get there!"

"Alright, I'll start the car and..."

"No, I'm running there. I can get there fast and change before someone notices me."

"Son, are you sure?"

"I need to practice right?"

He let me pass and I took no time to hesitate. The ground was wet from the storm and the sky was still cloudy but I did not care. Megan was in trouble. I dashed down the sidewalk as fast as I could. Surprisingly no cars or anything were out, so I had a straight dash for the hospital. I stopped in the alley and changed back to human, using a puddle for confirmation. Lucky for me, I grabbed a pair of shoes before I left. I ran inside and stopped at the counter. I scared the woman at the desk a little when I stopped. "What room is Megan Connors in?" I asked.
1541111212.title: To the Rescue!

15411112122.content:
"Megan Connors? Oh! Yes, she's on the third floor at the end of the hall. She should be in room..."

I didn't hear the rest because I bolted after I heard all I needed to know. Heck with the elevator, I ran up the stairs. I needed to know if she was okay. I got up there with some of my energy, but then I made a mistake. "End of the hall" could relate to any single hallway on the third floor. I sighed and ran down the halls. Usually whenever the rooms are occupied, they have the names listed on the outside. I ran down each hallway, but no luck. I ducked and dodged some nervous nurses trying to find her name. But it did lead to one thing.

"Of course it had to be the last hallway I look at" I said to myself. I ran down as fast as I could with as much energy that I had left. I didn't know how I could see that far, but the name on the end was Megan Connors. A man just left looking pretty mad about something. Something seemed off about him, he just smelled like trouble. I quickly grabbed the door handle and barged in. I saw Megan, she was okay and resting on a bed. Her expression now seemed horrible.

"I heard you were in trouble" I said while trying to control my breathing, "Are you okay?

Tears began to pool her eyes. "I'm not sure" she replied, teary eyed. "They found a tumor on my brain."

The instant she said that put my brain on overdrive in worry. I had a crush on her, there was no doubt there. But having a tumor on her brain was dangerous. Not many people survived a tumor on their brain! And even if they live after removal, they are never the same. I almost cried at the thought of it.

Fear not, wild one, she is safe said a voice.

It didn't came from the room, it sounded like it came from my head, or my brain. Megan seemed scared too. I had no idea what happened, but if that voice said Megan was safe, Megan is safe.
15411112122.title: Should I Worry or Not?

154111121221.content:
The doctor left with Mrs. Connors, something about another patient along with that strange doctor. Megan was crying, I wouldn't blame her. I felt like crying when I was that monster. But that voice sounded like she knew what was happening to her. "Who are you?" looking around, I demanded. "Show yourself!"

"Um... Travis, who are you talking to?" Megan's voice was shaky and nervous.

*He is talking to me, little one.* replied a voice. Both me and Megan were surprised by this voice. *I am the 'tumor' attached to your brain.*

Megan's eyes went wide and her breathing sped up. It looked as if she would pass out soon. "Okay, why are you inside her?" I asked while walking towards her. "Are you the one doing these things to her?"

*I am Zoe, a... symbiont. We provide certain abilities in return for 'room and board'. The headaches are an unfortunate side effect of awakening mental powers.*

"So, what ability did you give me?" asked Megan still teary eyed.

*I understand your fear. I have no control over what powers you receive but it seems you have the ability to control machines as your initial screams were heard on every electronic device for several yards around your house.*

"What of my teeth being metal?"

*I do not know. Sorry, I'm tired and I must rest.*

Zoe's voice silenced, leaving the room almost silent. I said almost, I could hear Megan's soft cries. She looked up at me with sparkling eyes, "Travis, I'm scared." That hit the last flag in my mind. I needed to comfort her. I embraced her in a warm hug as she returned the hug and began to cry on my shoulder. I whispered into her ear, "Don't worry, Megan. I will find you some answers."
154111121221.title: So it's not a tumor

choices: No time, tell her to call you later
1541111212211.content:
Something was wrong. No it wasn't the hug, I could just feel something bad in the area. I broke the hug and headed for the door. I was about to exit but then I saw Dr. Hagen. He was on the phone, but he was looking around to see if anyone was around. That is never a good sign. I closed the door but cracked it, putting my ear near the door. Surprisingly, I could hear the whole conversation.

"Yes boss what is it?" said a man.

"I want you and your boys to come to the hospital" Dr. Hagen replied. "There is a girl that needs...special attention."

I gasped at that but stayed silent as he continued. "There is also a boy in the room with the girl. He seems familiar somehow, so follow him once he leaves."

"We might need some identification boss. We can't just follow every teenage boy and girl that leaves the hospital."

"I'll get what you need, you just make sure you are not shirking your orders. We need to have every brat we can find."

He hung up the phone and I stepped away from the door. What was Dr. Hagen? Was he even a doctor?

"Travis....Travis what's wrong?" asked Megan.

She sounded scared, even more scared than before. I should tell her, after all she is a target too. Before I could say anything, she gasped, "Travis...there's a black van outside watching us."

I slowly walked towards the window and peeked out the corner. There was a black van out in the parking lot. It wasn't hard trying to find it because it was one of the only cars in that lot. My eyes started to feel weird. I focused more on the van, and I could see much better. I could see a man looking through binoculars through the tainted windows of the van.

"Megan...your right" I said. "How did you know?"

"I have control of machines, right? Well, when I just thought of the outside I could suddenly see the hospital parking lot. It must have been the security camera. But what do we do? What did you hear?"
1541111212211.title: Being Watched

15411112122111.content:
"It seems as if this 'good' Dr Hagen has an agenda of his own." looking at Megan, I replied. "Also, the guys in the black van are watching this room with binoculars."

Megan began to visibly shake, worried. "What- what do they want with us?" frightened, she asked.

"I'd say Hagen wants you for your ability to control machines." guessing, I replied. "I don't know if those guys in the van are working with that quack or with someone else but I do know that you're vulnerable here alone." I knotted my jaws in decision. "I'm staying here with you, just in case either one tries something."

"Travis, are you sure?" looking concerned, Megan asked. "They might come after you too."

"I have a few surprises of my own." smiling, I said. "Don't worry, I won't let you out of my sight, I promise."

Megan blushed slightly, a small grin forming onto her face. "Thanks, Travis."

I blushed slightly myself, though I tried to hide it. "You're welcome."

Fortunately, before things got too uncomfortable, Mrs Connors and Dr Stone returned to the room and Megan shouted, "There's someone watching this room!"

Thomas ran to the window and looked out to see the black van before it casually pulled away, out of the parking lot, before he turned back to Megan. "Whoever they were, they're gone now." he said.

"Just in case, I'd like to stay with Megan tonight." offering, I said. "She and I have been friends since kindergarten."

"That's fine with me, so long as you mom doesn't mind ." smiling, Mrs Connors replied. "I'd feel safer, knowing a strong guy like you was with her."

I blushed at that, not that I wasn't blushing already. "Thank you." I said. "I'll call mom now."

With that, I pulled out my cell phone and called my house.
15411112122111.title: Tell her

154111121221111.content:
"Hello?"

"Hi mom."

"Travis dear! How is your little girlfriend?"

"MOM! She is not my girlfriend!"

"But you said you had a crush on this girl..."

"Mom...I have a crush on her. That doesn't mean she likes me back."

"Okay dear, whatever you say. Now, why are you calling?"

"Megan is getting some unwanted attention from this weird doctor and these men in a black van. I'm telling you that I'm staying over to watch over her." There was a dead silence on the other line. I was worried, "Mom...?"

"Travis...oh yes....it's fine honey. I have to go now, bye!"

The call ended before I could say goodbye. Something must have spooked my mom because she usually never hangs up like that. I put my cellphone away and turned. Megan and her mother had this expression on their face like they suspected something. Then I realized it, they heard my half of the call. I blushed and quickly left the room to talk to Dr. Stone for sleeping arrangements. He offered for me to sleep on a patient bed, but I said I shouldn't do that. But, he insisted. Before we started talking, Megan was able to shut off that camera. It was creeping me out how it always followed us. We just talked about what our lives were like. She also explained how she first discovered her powers. Tell you what, it was worse than my experience. I didn't tell her because I think she would find me a freak. Nightfall soon came and I was exhausted. My eyes closed quickly and I slipped into unconsciousness.

============

Everything was dark at first, but then things formed into a hallway from my high school. A scream was heard behind me. I turned to see Megan. Her eyes were on me. I looked down and saw that I was in my cheetah form.

"Travis, your a freak!" she shouted.

"No no no!" I replied quickly. "I can be human again watch!"

I focused on being human and felt the changes happen. I looked down, but saw I was a wolf instead. Other people joined Megan and they all had a similar expression. I tried again and again, but every time I changed into a different animal. "Megan..."

"No! Stay away you freak!"

My heart shattered. Megan would never say those words would she? "But, I thought we were friends..."

"Friends...? With a freak like YOU?! HA!"

Everyone including Megan began to laugh. I tried to ignore it but their laughter just grew louder and louder. "No...I'm not a freak. Please, stop...I'm not a freak...I'm not a freak..."

=======

"Travis...Travis! Travis wake up!"

Someone was shaking me awake. I opened my eyes, seeing Megan. Her face had the recognizable expression of concern. "Travis...what happened to you?" I looked at my hands, they were paws. My arms were covered in fur. I reached up on my head, I had ears. I grabbed a small mirror and looked into it, I was an anthro cat.

I quickly pushed her away and hid behind the bed in the corner. Okay, I know I panicked but I don't want her to see me. She will think of me as a freak. I could feel tears coming out of my eyes.

"Travis...who did this to you...?" asked Megan.

I did not turn around. "My parents...my parents sort of...made me..."

"Made...you...?"

"I don't want to explain it...you would only..." I could hear her approaching, her footsteps fully audible.

"What would I do...?" she asked with concern.

"You would think I'm a freak. I'm nothing but a freak..."

"Travis....you feel like an alien...like me..."

I turned around, slightly surprised. She wasn't running or screaming. She was staying here. She kept coming closer, "But Megan...I don't think your a freak."

Megan smiled, "Nor do I." Her hand reached my head and she began to scratch between my ears. "You look cute."

The scratching calmed me down, heck it felt great! Now I know why cats love it so much. It may have been instincts, but I leaned my head closer to her head. A small purr escaped my lips, which caused Megan to giggle. I covered my mouth and put my head back.

"I didn't mean to do that!" I said quickly.

"Admit it Travis" she said with a smirk, "You enjoyed it."

I had to blush and nod. I stood up along with her. I gave her a warm hug, "Thanks Megan...I should have told you earlier." My tail started wrap around her leg, so I decided to change back. When we broke, Megan looked kinda sad, "Aw....did you have to change back so soon? You looked so cute! Could you change back for me...? Please!"
154111121221111.title: Secret revealed in an unexpected way

1541111212211111.content:
I was about to respond, but Megan suddenly screamed. I had no idea what she was doing, or why she was. Then, Megan began to hyperventilate. She must be trying to get me to change back.

"Okay, I'm changing! I'm changing!" I said, "Calm down!"

I changed into my cat form quickly so she would stop. But I finally noticed what she was screaming about. Her entire body looked like a metal mannequin straight off of the assembly line. She picked up the mirror I dropped, and screamed after looking into it. Before I could react, she started to change again. Pointed ears formed onto her head as well as her face forming cat like features. A tail grew from her lower back and her hands shifted into what looked more like paws. The gray color soaked back into her pores and in her place stood a stunned cat like girl. I had to admit, Megan looked really cute as a cat. "What...happened?" she asked, touching her new face.

She turned to me and seemed surprised to see my back as a cat. I couldn't help myself any longer, I smiled and felt my face flush. "You look cute Megan..."

"Not bad yourself, Travis" she said while blushing. "But how did this happen?"

"I think I can explain." entering the room, a man's voice said.

I turned to the door and saw Megan's father. He was a relatively tall and muscular man that was about 33 years old. He had short sand blond hair and blue eyes. "Daddy!" Megan exclaimed while crying. She ran to him quickly. "You know what's happening to me?"

He nodded before he turned to face me. "I can see you too are unique, Mr. Greenway" he said. I nodded and he continued. "You may stay but I urge you to keep what you hear silent."

"What am I dad?" Megan was on the verge of tears. I wanted to comfort her, but I might make it worse.

Her father knelled down to her level, smiling, "You got one power from me, and another from your mother. Remember that series you like so much in Teen Detectives magazine?"

Megan nodded but remained silent. Neither she nor I knew where her father was going with his explanation. He chuckled, giving me a knowing smile, "I was Sam, the ace driver of the Problem Child Gang."

"What!?!"

What the heck?! Who else was a member of the Problem Child Gang?! That jock Garth's father? That guy/girl Alyssa's parents?!

He smiled again, turning to me. "Your mother was Crystal, our mysterious informant" he said. "We did not know she was an unwilling worker for the Agency but we always considered her a member of the team."

I wanted to thank him, but Megan was more important. "How did I get these powers, dad?" Megan asked confused. "I don't remember reading about you having... this."

I don't remember him having these powers either. I wasn't really complaining that Megan was a super attractive cat girl, but she did not seem to like it. "Simple" he said while turning back to Megan. His form shifted into that metal mannequin Megan shifted into before. "I'm an alien."

Megan's jaw dropped along with mine. Suddenly gray washed over her, her normal form returning. Then her eyes suddenly rolled into the back of her head and she fainted.
1541111212211111.title: Megan's True Form?

15411112122111111.content:
Without a single request from her father, I quickly grabbed Megan before she hit the ground. I carried her to her bed and set her down gently. Her father smiled, "A bit of a shock, I suppose." watching me he said. "I am glad to see you are so kind to my daughter." returning to his human form, he added, "A certain group may be after her soon."

"I will protect her, even if my life depended on it."

I have no idea why I said that. It seemed it was almost on instinct. Mr Connors simply nodded. "I trust you will protect her, Mr Greenway." serious, he said. then his cell phone rang. "Excuse me a moment."

I nodded as he left, talking into his phone. He did not return so I stood over Megan, watching the door, listening for anything that may sound like a threat. The hours past, but I did not feel the urge of rest gnaw on me. I was wide awake with the task at hand. Then, I heard faint footsteps down the hall, it was multiple individuals. Seeing that I would need the element of surprise, I quickly and silently hid in a closet. With my eyes already adjusted to the darkness, I saw four men wearing black suits enter. Three had a gun and another had a large needle.

"Is this girl really as powerful as the boss says she is?" asked the one.

"Who cares....as long as we get paid what we've been promised." snapped the other. "With what she offered, I'd kidnap a little baby for all I care!"

"But what if she wakes up?" asked the one holding the needle.

"We sedate her you idiot!" whispered the first one who spoke. "That's why you're holding the needle!"

"She'll struggle." said the third man. "Think the boss will care if the 'package' is damaged?"

"The boss wants her alive, she never said anything about her getting injured."

A growl escaped my lips. Wanting to induce fear from the start, I didn't even try to muffle it, I let it out. The four men looked around, "What is that, a growl?" asked the fourth man, curious.

"There isn't any animals in here...is there?"

"It sounds like a wolf..."

"NO MAN! Don't say that! I'm terrified of wolves..."

"Keep it together, you morons." snapped the one who seemed to be the leader. "It's just the pipes."

A smile crept on my face. I shifted into a Anthro wolf but then went onto all fours. In the dark, they would not see I was part human, just a wolf. The weirdest thing was that I could feel this strange new strength in my body, it was like I had a sudden surge of power. I charged through the door, ripping it off its hinges (not on purpose) and pounced onto the one holding the needle, knocking it out of his grasp. I think I felt his ribs crack under my blow, knocking the wind out of him. Only I had no time to deal with that. Before the others could react, I jumped up onto my two feet and quickly punched out the other two then pinned the fourth, the leader, against the wall, forcing his to drop his weapon. Growling in his face, I demanded, "Who sent you?!"

He spat in my face, "There's my answer, fleabag!"

I wiped the spit away from my face and then bared my teeth. I loudly roared in his face, snapping my teeth an inch from his eyes. Now his face held an expression of fear and I easily lifted him off the floor with one hand.

"Listen and listen good... human." I growled, "You tell your boss that Megan Connors is off limits." with a wolk like growl, I added, "LEAVE THE GIRL ALONE!"

I then threw him away from me like I would an old rag doll. His body flew out the door, slamming into the outside hall, cracking the wall. I watched his slide to the floor unconscious. As if on instinct, I howled in triumph. It was a haunting howl, I frightened myself with it. I turned my gaze back to Megan to find her awake, pulled from her sleep from the sounds of the struggle. She was sitting on her bed, against the wall, shivering. I could tell she was very much afraid by my display of power.

"It's still me inside, Megan." assuring her, I said. "I would never hurt you."

"I was afraid of the men... not you." still shaking, Megan said.

Then, I heard more footsteps approaching. Fearing there were reinforcements coming, I quickly took Megan into my arms and held her tight. "We need to go, now!" frantic, I said.

Running to the open window, I jumped through, thankful the camera was still offline. Falling from the fifth floor, I changed into a human (just for a second) then became a human like eagle. I had become something like a bird man, I suppose. I held onto Megan with my feet, without stabbing her, and landed on the sidewalk after carefully dropping her. I changed back into human form but found I was unable to change again, I was just too tired. Then, a gray, futuristic looking car pulled up. The doors automatically opened and Mr. Connors voice echoed from within.

"Megan, Travis, get in!"
15411112122111111.title: An Uncontrolled Experience

154111121221111111.content:
I took the driver's side as Megan climbed into the passenger seat. We both let out a yelp as the seat belts crossed over us on their own before the car took off on its own. I was not expecting this at all, a self-driving car. Megan's dad's laughter echoed through the radio speakers. "You're not touching any part of me, sweetie" he said amused, "This is the family car, I simply added my own essence to it."

"You're possessing the car?" morbidly impressed, I asked. "Nice." It was cool, taking over technology like that. If I had to change my powers to anything, that would have been my next choice.

"That's a crude way of putting it, Travis" chuckling, Steve said. "As accurate as any, I guess." He seemed to turn serious as the car screamed around a corner. "Listen you two, things are heating up faster than I had feared. Sykes is back in town and the Agency has resurfaced."

Megan gasped, "That organization existed!?"

I was surprised too. I guess my mom was telling the truth after all. Everything in those comics were real.

"Everything in that story existed, Megan" flatly, Steve replied. "I'm guessing those who tried to kidnap you were hired thugs from Sykes or someone else. Most likely to test your powers, search for weaknesses."

"What makes you think it wasn't this agency?" I asked curiously.

"If it was the Agency, both of you would be unconscious, bound and gagged, on your way to parts unknown." serious, Steve replied. "They are ruthless professionals in the field of espionage and assassination."

Megan gulped at that, "What are we to do?"

"The original members of the gang are holding a meeting." The car sped onto the freeway quickly. "With a little luck, we'll get there before it ends and we can formulate a plan. Travis, you and I need to talk about your power."

"What about my power?" I asked while turning to the radio, "I saved Megan's life back there!"

"I am grateful for that, believe me. Look at your face in the mirror, though. You are white as a sheet and you were not changed for all that long."

I did as he complied and found that he was telling the truth. My face was as white as a brand new plain T-shirt. I touched my face to make sure it was my skin. "What's wrong with him, dad?" Megan asked with concern.

"Like you, Travis is just discovering his power, honey." gently, dad replied. "You both need to learn how to control it so you do not push yourselves beyond your normal limits." pausing, he added, "Megan, I would not shape shift too often."

"Why?" curious, Megan asked.

"The human body is not designed for it and you are half human." morbidly serious, dad replied. "Each time you change, you risk injuring yourself. After you you fainted, I did a quick scan with a med-wand, an alien device."

"What did you find?" nervous, Megan asked.

"You had pulled every muscle and tendon in your body." darkly, dad replied. "I'd refrain from changing shapes unless absolutely necessary, young lady."

"What are you suggesting we do?" I asked.

"I can offer you a learning tool, used by my people to learn control. However, it was not built with humans in mind so it may 'misfire' from time to time, giving you a form you did not have in mind."

With that, the middle compartment opened and an odd bracelet rose from within. It looked like someone took apart a clock and built it into a piece of jewelry.

"It may appear simple in design but, I assure you, it is more complex than you can imagine" he said seriously. "Travis, I urge you to trust me and wear the bracelet. Still, as it was not designed for humans, I will not force you."
154111121221111111.title: A Little Help?

1541111212211111112.content:
I looked at the strange device. On one hand this could allow me total control but may misfire. On the other hand I could train myself but also risk hurting myself. "What about Megan?" I asked.

"I have one for her but its too dangerous for her to use that power too often." he replied. "This is just in case we do not meet again."

"Are you sure it doesn't come in a necklace?" I joked.

Megan's dad chuckled, "I realize a bracelet may be a bit 'girly' but I assure you it is helpful."

I reached out and grasped the device. But, I placed it into my pocket. "Thanks for the device, but I will not use it just yet. I think I will see how training on my own goes before I use it."

"Understandable... but just promise me you will not lose it. If the Agency gets that device and learns from it, they could produce a device that would allow them to control your forms."

"I promise."

With that the car suddenly stopped. "We're here, get out" he demanded. Megan and I got out at the same time and met on the sidewalk. We took notice to the front of the car and saw a silver liquid-like substance flow out of the grill. It flowed into a puddle that started to rise. As it rose, features like arms and legs appeared. Then, his head along with clothing features appeared as well. Lastly, the silver color drained from his body. The puddle formed into Megan's father.

"That is so cool!" I said.

"Yes, I got a lot of that the first time" he replied. "But... Travis, do you have any other clothes?"

I was confused for a sec but looked down. My shirt and shorts were still clinging to my body, but they were in shreds. Most of my upper body was revealed, showing a surprisingly amount of muscle. I guess this was a likely extra for my powers. But I'm not complaining, I saw Megan stare at me before she turned to hide a blush.

"Sorry, but no" I replied, "I left my pack at home."

Megan grabbed my arm, "Don't worry Travis, you look fine to me."

I blushed at that while we headed to the door. Megan's father knocked on the door, waiting for a reply.
1541111212211111112.title: Decline

15411112122111111121.content:
"Who is it?!" a loud from voice yelled.

"Sam Connors and company." replied Megan's dad. "Someone tried to take my daughter, Ted. I have one of her friends with me, we need to talk."

The door opened and we stepped in. I was surprised by the amount of people inside. There was Garth and Grace, Alyssa, Caitlin was even there! I couldn't believe Mrs. Snooty Rich Kid was here! Two adults approached us, the one who approached me seemed to be Mexican in ethnicity.

The woman with Megan gently grasped her arm. "Easy, Megan" she said, "You better sit down a bit, dear."

"I-I'm fine" I said. I didn't want them to worry about me. If anything, I didn't want to seem weak in front of these guys.

"The hell you are, Chico" the Mexican said to me sternly. "You look like a ghost, sit down and rest."

"I said I'm fine. I just need to catch my breath." What was with this woman? I'm not that helpless. However the woman continued, "Sit... down."

I've never met someone who was so firm. Continuing to fight would only make things "Yes, ma'am" I said.

"It's good to see you again, old friend" said the man with the sidearm. "Any idea who tried to kidnap your daughter and her friend?"

"They weren't professionals" Sam said quickly, "I'm guessing they were sent by Sykes." Sam motioned towards Megan and I. "These two are just now discovering their 'gifts'. Megan's gift left her a bit shaken, same with Travis."

"What can you do?" Caitlin asked lying on the couch. "Mine is mental powers. Though I kind of over did it a few minutes ago."

"Megan can control machines and transform to some extent... you know why." dad said motioning me to remain quiet. "Travis has the ability to become any animal, including Anthros and mythological creatures." he then sighed, turning to us. "I know you two have a voice of your own but you are both seriously drained from the kidnap attempt, rest all you can as you will be training very soon."

"Were they hurt?" asked Lyssa, concerned.

"Travis pushed himself to save Megan from being taken. Megan did the same only it was from her powers going a bit nuts on her."

"Like mine did at the beginning, turning into a behemoth." Garth said slightly shaken. "My power is super strength."

"Just like your dad" Sam said smiling. But he turned serious, "We need a plan and time is something we don't have a lot of, we need to act, now."

What do you suggest?" asked a woman.
15411112122111111121.title: The Meeting

choices: Yes, Megan and Travis are staying together
154111121221111111211.content:
Everyone managed to be calm and I was able to learn most of everyone's name. "We need to get everyone started on training the sooner the better" said Geo. "I know of such a place, the original group headquarters near the coast. It's only about twenty miles from here."

"I thought our headquarters were destroyed by the Agency days after we escaped Sykes' death trap in Rome" a woman asked confused. "They completely burned the summer home mansion to the ground, trying to get to us."

"That was the sister mansion in England" countered Geo. "I'm talking about the original headquarters, here in the States, where we first starting training to hone our skills while not gallivanting around the world. It's old but its still standing and we can go there in a second's notice."

"The kids will still need individual training" Sarah said worried. "Also, their skills are far more advanced than ours were."

"They will get individual training. You see, I had a feeling we had not seen the last of the Agency so I had an underground... err... vacation village constructed in a cave system for all of us to run to with our families, just in case."

[i]Wow... that actually sounds slightly creepy...[/i]

"All of the training facilities we need are there?" asked a man.

Geo nodded, "It has everything we need to live and train for as long as it takes. We can live there or commute there. Its just an option."

"We'll commute there" said the man. "The Agency will know we're onto them if we all suddenly vanish. Still, we must be on our toes at all times, understood!?" Everyone nodded and he turned back to Geo, "I will check the mansion and training facility to ensure its safe and secure. We can take two along with us."

I was both glad and sad that we were splitting up. I was happy because if one of us gets caught, the others can be notified. I was sad because I may never see Megan again.


Does Megan and Travis stay together?
154111121221111111211.title: Plan of Action

1541111212211111112111.content:
After the meeting, Steve took me by the arm and pulled me aside with Megan following. "You, your mother, and father will be staying with my family, I already called my wife, she is on her way to pick them up." firmly, Steve said. "Our house is a fortress and its security system is... 'chuckle'... out of this world."

"Really, dad?" rolling her eyes, Megan asked.

"Jokes aside, you also need training, both of you." turning serious, Steve said. "Travis, you are far too slow in your Anthro transformations which makes you vulnerable. Megan, your ability to control machines is wild, unfocused, you need to work on that and fast."

I tried to ask how but Steve was already pushing us out of Mr Jones' house to the car. "I will drive you all the normal way to conserve energy." opening the driver's side door, he said. "Get in, we have little time."

Uncertain, I stepped into the back seat as Megan did the same. We blushed, meeting each other as Steve chuckled. "Normally, you fight over sitting up front, Megan." buckling himself in, he said. "Interesting..."

I blushed more as Megan smiled, blushing as well. "Someone has to warn him who he is up against." teasing, she said.

Steve laughed as he started the engine and pulled away from the Jones residence. "Your training will start in the rumble room at my house." looking at me through the rear view, he said. "It's sort of like an arena where I privately train." he smiled, adding, "I am anxious to see what you two have on the ball."

Minutes later, we arrived at the Connor's house where Steve led us inside to a large room with heavily padded walls, floor, and ceiling. Inside, I saw mom and dad waiting for us with Mrs Connors. She was nearly Steve's height with a slender but well toned body and long blond hair and green eyes. Seeing her, I knew where Megan got her good looks.

"Anna, could you please escort our guests to the observation room?" politely, Steve asked. "This training could get intense and I don't want anyone getting injured."

Anna nodded and let mom and dad out.
1541111212211111112111.title: Yes, Megan and Travis are staying together

15411112122111111121111.content:
Once the door closed with a soft click, I turned only to scream, seeing Steve coming at me, his form quickly changing to that of a humanoid bear. I rose my arms to defend myself then paused as Steve stopped his advancement, a smile on his face as he chuckled.

“Yeah, that’s going to scare a bear away.” sarcastically, he said. “You need to learn how to think on your feet, young man.” He then pointed to Megan who had her hands raised; they were glowing. “Follow my daughter’s example.”

“I-Is this mom’s power?” confused, Megan asked.

“Your mother had the power to run at incredible speeds with little effort.” returning to his human form, Steve replied. “Look at your hands, they are not glowing, they are creating heat from vibrating at high velocity." smiling, he added, "You could leave a person a very nasty burn by merely touching him right now.”

Megan gasped and focused on relaxing herself, eventually getting her hands to stop vibrating. “Dad, I could have hurt you.” Tearing up, she said. “I- I’m so sorry.”

Steve smiled. “You forget my power, Megan.” chuckling, he said. “You would not have harmed me in the slightest as I can withstand a lot more than you might think.” turning serious, he said, "Strange, but that power seems to only be focused in your hands."

"It's an Amazonian fighting technique." came mom's voice through a speaker. we all looked up to see mom and Mr and Mrs Greenway watching us through an observation window.

"What are you saying, mom?" curious, Megan asked.

"You have some of your father's natural gifts and some of mine." smiling, mom replied. "However, the two together have strangely given you the power to control machines with your mind."

Steve smiled then turned back to Travis. “Shall we continue with your training?”

I nodded. “I’ll be ready for you this time.” Confident, I said.

Steve laughed. “Will you now?” amused, he asked. “We’ll see…”

Before another move could be made, a television in the room turned itself on, revealing a test screen as a voice declared, 'Pueri Problementa!'

“Problem child in Latin.” Surprised, I said. “What does it mean?”

“It means someone has placed a note in the ‘blind post office’.” Surprised as well, Steve replied. “I’m surprised it’s still working after all this time.”

“It could be a trap.” serious, Megan mussed. “I mean, who would use the ‘blind post office’? Most people believe the group is just a legend.”

“That and the kidnap attempt earlier.” frowning, Steve said. “You two are not ready to jump into anything right now.” He shook his head. “Forget you saw that.”

“But dad…” softly, Megan protested.

“You are not ready, Megan!” sternly, Steve said. “You both just discovered your powers and barely have a grasp as to how to control them!” he sighed. “Besides, if anything happens to either of you, I will never hear the end of it from my wife. Let’s continue.”

“I can handle myself, sir.” with a sigh, I said.

“I promise you are not ready, young man.” firmly, Steve said.

With that, he changed into a humanoid wolf before charging me. This time, I had my guard up and quickly changed to that of a humanoid wolf to match him. Only Steve changed into a humanoid bear in a heartbeat and threw me like a rag doll into one of the padded walls. I moaned, my body changing back to human form, and looked up to see him standing over me.

“Did I make my point?” returning to human form, Steve asked. “You must be focused at all times, in all situations if you want to stay alive, Travis. I learned this the hard way and it almost cost me my life. I will not allow you two to make the same mistake.”

"So... what do we do?" uncertain, I asked.

Steve sighed. "We keep training." softly, he said. "Relax. You'll get your chance to bust a few bad guys soon enough."
15411112122111111121111.title: Light training.

154111121221111111211111.content:
I stood up, ready to fight again. My body was in pain, but I needed this. Steve never moved. Instead, he motioned to the safety room, the door opening. He walked out, but he stopped just before to motion us to walk out.

"A thought came to me" he said. "Your transformations are limited. You could have changed into something else to defeat me, but you went as a wolf."

I felt embarrassed. "Yeah..." I replied, "That was one of the ones I remember..."

"Exactly. I think that before we start training, and you decide to go out on your own, I believe that we should expand your capabilities."

The room we entered resembled a large indoor pool. I was confused to there was a small control panel against the wall, but I amazed by the size of it. It had to at least be 30 yards wide and 35 yards long.

Steve chuckled, "Yes I know it's size. But it can get bigger as well as deeper."

As the pool widened, Megan looked shocked. "How can you build this stuff?"

"We're aliens Megan...this would be something easy. But your mom helped us with this Travis."

Before I could ask, I felt something snap to my leg. I looked down, it was a spherical weight. Without hesitation, I was shoved into the pool.

"Travis!" was the last thing I heard.

Steve was not kidding when he said the pool could go deeper. I was at least in 20 feet of water! I struggled against the weight, hoping it would come loose. The air escaped my lungs, I couldn't focus. The last bit of air escaped, I needed to take a breath.

My need for air did not come out of my mouth. Instead, I felt my breath returning. I had no idea what was happening, but it was cool. I could see clearly, I could breathe, it was almost like I was a fish. That was the strange thing, I had nothing like a fish; I was completely human!

The thought of Megan returned to me, so I unlatched the weight and swam up. The chain could have been unlatched at any time; if Steve wasn't Megan's father I would punch him.

The moment I reached to surface and climbed out, I was hugged by Megan. "Travis! When I saw the last air bubble, I thought...." She trailed off when her gaze hit my neck. I felt that area, feeling the gills that I saw about a few days ago.

Steve was even shocked. "Travis, could you always change parts of your body?"

I shook my head. "I had these gills the first day. I guess they just showed up because I needed them."

He was quiet. Megan and I grew concerned, even scared. "You two can explore and enjoy the rest of the day" he said, "I have...an errand to run..."

The choice of words were suspicious, but then again he only wants our protection. Megan grabbed a towel and dried off a bit. "So what should we do?" she asked.

"Why don't you pick?" I asked.

I wanted her to pic because I wasn't sure she would like what I pick. She pondered for a bit before smiling and facing me. "I would like to..."
154111121221111111211111.title: That's one way of doing it

choices: Megan continues to scratch, Travis getting more and more affectionate
Travis's stomach growls, making Megan stop
1541111212211111112111112.content:
"Well...you got to test out your powers...now I want to try mine." I smiled, she showed quite a bit of determination. She grabbed my hand and pulled me along. We needed to stop a few times to navigate through this maze of a house, but we eventually found our way. I have to say, Megan's home was very big. Then again, they're aliens, they could keep on building if they needed to.

I followed Megan into a large gym-like area. There was a properly sized indoor track. She smiled as she ran on, "Come on Travis!" She wanted to race, against me. My form shifted into a cheetah before I walked onto the track. We both stood ready to run. "Are you sure you want to race me?" I asked, "I ran miles without even trying!"

"I am sure" was all she said. "3...2...1...GO!"

I sprinted forward, trying to run my hardest. Okay, I was slacking a bit. I mean, Megan was only a few feet out and I nearly completed one fourth of the track! When she hit halfway, I ran back beside her. But that was my mistake. Her entire body glowed before she zoomed off. I fell but stood up, only to find I already lost. I ran over as Megan started cheering, "I told you I would win!"

I sighed, "Yeah...you did..."

"Hey, shouldn't you change back? Remember how your body was drained?"

"Well if I'm going to get used to changing, I should at least remain in a form for a while. Besides..." I bent down a bit so my face met her's, "I thought you liked me as an animal."

She giggled before she started to scratch between my ears. On instinct, I relaxed and began to purr. This made Megan giggle even more. "Different species...same result." The scratching continued, the feeling getting better and better.
1541111212211111112111112.title: Racing Spots

15411112122111111121111121.content:
The scratches kept coming, the feeling becoming almost addictive. I knew cats loved this, but this was something else! But I could feel my mind slipping, like all I wanted was her to pet me. "Megan...I think..." My last attempt to stop this was ended short. Megan scratched underneath my chin, the feeling skyrocketed. I couldn't take it anymore, this urge was overcoming my consciousness. "Megan... stop." feeling myself losing it, I thought.

Megan continued to scratch my chin and head and, driving my emotions wild. The cheetah side of me was quickly taking over, loud purrs filled the room. Megan laughed until she heard a deep growl, me wanting to move out of the foreplay and into something more serious. I remember rubbing my head against hers; she allowed it so I moved to the next phase, thinking it was okay.

"Maybe she'll change into animal form too." wishfully thinking, I thought. "That would be cool."

I began to get my entire body into it, which was when Megan realized what she had started and began to worry and pushed off, "Okay Travis, that's..."

I growled at Megan before I could stop myself, I felt as if I had become more animal than man at this point and began to worry myself. "Megan, back off... slowly." desperately, I thought. "Get away from me!"

Megan looked into his eyes and began to slowly back away as if my eyes did not belong to me anymore. My growling became deeper as I actually came down onto all fours and approached her, the animal side of me getting stronger despite my mental protests to stop myself. I feared Megan now regretted scratching me like she did.

"Travis please...it's me..."

I was no longer in control, I roared fiercely to silence her, just before I pounced on her, driven wild by my own animal instincts and hormones. A quick swipe of my paw sliced part of the tank top she was wearing. She looked in fear, "Travis...I-I don't want t-to hurt you..."

Another swipe, but this time I got her skin. A set of deep wounds appeared on her shoulder. Megan let out a small scream of pain. That was when a blast of light emitted from her and she landed what felt like a hundred strong blows to my gut in less than a second, sending me into convulsions. The pain was intense, though it only lasted a few seconds, and I slumped to the floor unconscious from the shock but remained in anthro form.

Unknown to me, Sam had rushed in when Megan screamed and saw her attack onto me before he rushed over to her, "Megan! Are you okay?!"

Megan did not answer, she looked at me, lying unconscious with a number of deep bruises in the same spot where I had scratched her in a blind rush of passion....
15411112122111111121111121.title: Going Wild

154111121221111111211111211.content:
I jolted up suddenly. My body finally letting me regain control. Immediately, I saw Megan's look of horror. Then, I saw the scars. I....I did those...

It took me a few seconds but I then saw her father. Oh crap... He started to walk to me, his face having no emotion. He flexed his hand, but it wasn't into a fist. He came closer, and I was still wondering what he was doing. Suddenly, long silver claws grew from his fingertips. I didn't have the time to react, I was slashed right across my chest. The pain was so bad that I turned human again. There was a slight pain near my face, but most of it was on my chest.

"If you can't control yourself, find another girlfriend" growling, Sam said. "Let those scars on your chest be a reminder."

He walked away right after that. Megan ran to me, but I turned away. It hurt, but not as much as it did in my heart. "Megan...I-I'm dangerous... You're not safe around me..."

I stood up, trying to get away from her. But she was already there. "Travis, your not dangerous...your just..."

"No Megan listen! I made scars on your shoulder! And that was all from a ear scratch!" I shifted quickly back into a cheetah, turning from her, "I know we weren't dating, but we can't be together if this is what's going to happen."

I ran out of the room, ran down hallways, I looked for somewhere where she couldn't find me. I gave up and just his in the room that they provided me with. I sat in the corner, tail wrapped around me and ears to the side. I locked the door so no one got in. I don't know how long I sat there crying, but I dozed off.

A small click woke me up, along with the creak of the door opening. "I locked the door for a reason..." I said coldly.

"Yeah, but these are electrical locks" she replied. I heard her footsteps but she stopped a few feet behind me. "What's wrong...?" I asked, "Afraid I will attack again...?"

"Travis..."

"Megan...just...just..." I started to cry again. How could I ever be with her if my animal inside takes over every time? That was when I felt something. Megan wrapped her arms around me, she was giving me a hug. I managed to turn, "Megan...what are you...?"

"Travis listen to me" she said. "You are not a monster. You may be dangerous, but you are not a monster. You are a sweet boy that will protect me from everything. There will be a few scrapes and bruises along the way, but that is what makes a relationship strong. I...I like you...and I don't want to lose you."

Her crying made me cry, but I embraced her fully. She did care, and even though I hurt her, she still cared.
154111121221111111211111211.title: Eye for an Eye, Scar for a Scar?

1541111212211111112111112112.content:
Suddenly, a deep growl entered the room. Megan shot up and looked at me. "Wasn't entirely me..." I said embarrassed, "That was...my stomach..."

Megan giggled,  "Well then Splice, time to eat..."

She helped me up before we walked out of the room. On the way to the kitchen I learned something, my chest wasn't the only thing that was scratched. Sam managed to nick my face, leaving a small scar on my right eye. It didn't damage my eye, but it might be there for a while; as well as the scars on my chest too.

As soon as we entered the kitchen I froze. Megan's father was in there. He turned, seeing me beside his daughter, in the same form that hurt her. I quickly shifted from that to a wolf, going into my human form for a second. He just stood there, staring at me. "Why are you in anthro form?" he asked.

I gulped, nervous as heck. Megan may have similar powers, but he had more experience. "Uh...I figured that...uh...if I stay like this from time to time, my body could be used to it. And I figured I might as well try to unlock a new form too..."

He smiled, "Smart move." I let out a huge sigh. "But since we're telling each other things, I need to tell you two something. Just because your here and on the team doesn't mean you won't leave your normal lives. You two have school tomorrow."

"WHAT?!" we both shouted.

"Dad! It was never mentioned in the comics about you guys still going to school!"

"Do you think it would have been a good comic if it did?" Megan huffed, admitting defeat. "You two better rest up today..."

"Could you at least show us how to work this kitchen?" I asked.
1541111212211111112111112112.title: Normal Life Return

choices: No time to explain. (a shot is fired)
15411112122111111121111121122.content:
The following morning, mom gave me a quick kiss before Sam escorted us out into the car. "I want you all to promise me not to use your gifts in public." serious, Sam said as he buckled his seat belt. "We all used disguises and false names to hide our identity, you two have nothing yet."

"I give you my word, sir." nodding, I said.

"I promise, daddy." also serious, Megan said.

Sam nodded and started the car before driving out towards the school. Only, as the school came into view, he slammed on the breaks, startling us both. Before either of us could say a word, Sam sharply ordered, "Megan... binoculars, NOW!!"

Looking frightened, Megan obeyed immediately and got the small binoculars out of the glove box and handed them to Sam who brought them to his eyes, looking out the windshield. A moment later, a deep growl emitted from deep in his throat, making both Megan and I to shiver. "That's Clarence Mayweather on that roof top!" anger in his voice, he said. "He's the bastard who put Sarah Vance into a wheelchair!" he growled again, adding, "He has a rifle in his hands!"

Both Megan and I gasped, wondering if there was anything we could do. Then Sam turned to us both sharply. "We need to make whoever he is targeting harder to zero in on." quickly, he said. "Travis, Megan, follow my lead!"

Megan and I nodded and scrambled out of the car before we all followed Sam as we changed into complete wolf forms and charged the students, growling and howling. The students screamed and scattered in all directions as we snapped at their heels. "This is actually kind of fun." darkly, I thought. "I just hope I don't bump into Garth or the others."

At that moment, a powerful hand made contact with my underside and I felt myself being violently thrown through the air. Pain filled my frame as I crashed through a window, forcing my body to return to human form. I weakly looked up to find the rock carved form of Garth Jones. "What the hell do you think you're doing!?" impatiently, he asked.

I slowly got up and replied...
15411112122111111121111121122.title: Skip to beginning of school
